content: Jack Everitt & Desiree Dickerson - THNDR Games - Complete Interview - To the Moon - Episode 54https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x0mBjpF7PYIThis our complete interview with Jack Everitt & Desiree Dickerson o0f THNDR Games, a mobile gaming studio which makes video games which integrate Bitcoin's Lightning Network in order to allow gamers to win Satoshis by playing.-----------------------------------------------Follow THNDR Games on social media:Jack on Twitter: https://twitter.com/jackeverittDesiree on Twitter: https://twitter.com/dickerson_desTHNDR on Twitter: https://twitter.com/THNDRGAMESTHNDR Discord: https://discord.com/invite/3rwHwfjKrjTHNDR Telegram: https://t.me/thndrgamesTHNDR on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thndrgames/THNDR Website: https://www.thndr.games/-----------------------------------------------Welcome to the 54th episode of Bitrefill's To The Moon Podcast. To The Moon is Bitrefill's new weekly podcast to discuss Bitcoin, altcoins, adoption, news & current events, and all things crypto.
